archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0458
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a transition customer i expect vodafone to capture all my requirements in one order

properties.value: This is about upselling the customer with additional addons, VAS, etc in one go. Also a nice to have would be to add new services (mobile, broadband), but that depends if this can be designed to be easy to use and understandable by the customer.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
